1.content: David wakes up inside of his cousin alex's room. David had spent the night there after watching a marvel marathon. You just see an ocean of covers in front of you and a mountain dew bottle the size of a boat next to you. Panic rises in David's gut as he realizes he shrunk somehow. He looks around wondering what the next move should be. He decides to slide down to the floor and try to find someone to help. He slides down with ease and walks over to the closet. The closet had a mirror and he stares at himself for a while. You can tell taht you are 4 inches tall compared to the pencils lying on the floor by you. Suddenly the door opens who is walking in?
1.title: The start

11.content: You look up and Towering over you like a skyscraper is your aunt Jessica. She is wearing striped sweatpants blue and white. And a gray v neck t-shirt. She is bare foot you can only see half of her foot. Her feet are insanely huge like two school busses side by side. They are tan with french tip painted toe nails. She scans the room the walks towards the bed. Her foot rises right over you and you felt the heat coming off of them for the brief moment they were near you. When she reached the bed she removed the covers then turned around and yelled is anyone home? She look puzzled then shrugged and proceeded to leave. What is your move?
11.title: Your aunt Jessica

info.brief_description: You are shrunk at your aunts house. Lets make a good story.
info.description: So this is a tale that we shall write together of a tiny man named David who shrunk at his aunt Jessica's house. If you add people they must be 18 and older Aunt Jessica has a size 13 foot and is a thick latina women. She is 36 years old. You can add an uncle, a neighbor, a dog who gives a shit. Just write some erotica. . Chapters must be at least a paragraph, unless its necessary for it to have less.
